informationStorage

Class SiegeTankStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • informationStorage.SiegeTankStorage

  • public class SiegeTankStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    SiegeTankStorage.java --- Shared storage Class for PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank instances, mainly due to them needing a storage for already grouped Units.
    Author:
    P H - 18.12.2017
